Reviews.Title: My phone from amazon
Reviews.Author: Teresa Guthrie
Reviews.Content: The phone freezes up and have to take the battery out to restart it not so happy with it boo

Reviews.Title: Not happy with the product
Reviews.Author: Carol P.
Reviews.Content: Phone never worked right.  Not happy with it at all.  I just had to purchase another phone to take its place.

Reviews.Title: It's better then what I had.
Reviews.Author: Brierrose70
Reviews.Content: I will start off by saying that I was surprised at how fast it got to me. It said a week and it only to two days. I like the phone, haven't had any issues with it since I started using it. The only thing I was a little disappointed in was the picture showed ear pieces, original box and a hard case for the phone but when it came all I got was the phone and a charger. But I really cant complain. I got a great phone and it is so much better then what I had. Plus you cant beat the price.  Lovin my new phone and my daughter wants one too.

Reviews.Title: It is a ok phone.
Reviews.Author: dickgt
Reviews.Content: Not much to say, its a GS1. So, I would never purchase this phone again, but it is exactly what I ordered. A temp smartphone for US Cellular.

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Mesmerize i500 - Android - US Cellular
